channel.title: Uncalled Attack v2 [Project Insanity]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.byspot.com/a_images/a_1878.gif[/img][/center] [b]I'm using the Exion's source[/b] for this server and I have got a lot of progress done in just a matter of weeks! I have been updating tons recently, but sadly after my project ended with the first Uncalled Attack, I deleted my source files and was done pretty much with all RS2 Protocol; that's also the reason for my downtime here on MoparScape. Though I'm back with a new server project, I've realized that I truly wasn't finished with Uncalled Attack after all, now here I am making a v2 of it!
[size=12pt][b]Remember that I'm using Exion's![/b][/size]
[u][b]Features:[/b][/u] -100% Barrows effects -Fixed turmoil -Basic NPC clipping -Edited Barrows minigame -Added PK points -Added a PkP shop -Added a Barrows shop [b]-Added the Curse Prayers[/b] -Edited Quest Tab -Added a Quest Tab voting method -Added basic Firemaking -Mass edited the Firemaking code -Better login methods -Added vengence -Edited the trading method -Added ::pure and ::master commands -Added repeating message -Edited starter -Fixed duping -Added an economy reset (emergencies only) [b]-Fixed the leech prayers [Curse prayers][/b] -Added Draynor NPC thieving -Fixed Falador -Added donor ranks -Mod information NPC -Fixed mute command -A fixed ::noclip command whether they add it to the client or not -Edited the hit system -Fixed duping methods -Fixed the Jad minigame -Highscores (shows only #1)
[hr] [u][b]Goals:[/b][/u] Red = Not Started Orange = working on Green = Completed
Jad minigame Basic NPC clipping Quest Tab voting method Firemaking Curse Prayers Perfect magic Perfect melee Perfect Ranging Perfect PvE Perfect PvP Perfect Fishing Perfect Woodcutting Sweets Skillcape Emotes Perfect Fight Pits Zamorak Boss 474 anims load from the Cache Fullscreen 474 GFX load from cache Item degrading Sea Troll Queen Giant Mole BarrelChest Vengence Pk Points PkP Shop SoulSplit Mod Information NPC NPC Thieving No Dupes Highscores [hr]
So you can see that I've done quite a bit in just a few weeks. I hope that I could add plenty more updates in the future.
[u][b]Here's Some Images:[/b][/u] [img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/3082/uav21.png[/img] [img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/3172/uav22.png[/img] item.title: Uncalled Attack v2 [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[center][/center]
I’m using the Exion’s source for this server and I have got a lot of progress done in just a matter of weeks!
I have been updating tons recently, but sadly after my project ended with the first Uncalled Attack, I deleted my source files and was done pretty much with all RS2 Protocol; that’s also the reason for my downtime here on MoparScape. Though I’m back with a new server project, I’ve realized that I truly wasn’t finished with Uncalled Attack after all, now here I am making a v2 of it!

[size=12pt]Remember that I’m using Exion’s![/size]

Features:
-100% Barrows effects
-Fixed turmoil
-Basic NPC clipping
-Edited Barrows minigame
-Added PK points
-Added a PkP shop
-Added a Barrows shop
-Added the Curse Prayers
-Edited Quest Tab
-Added a Quest Tab voting method
-Added basic Firemaking
-Mass edited the Firemaking code
-Better login methods
-Added vengence
-Edited the trading method
-Added ::pure and ::master commands
-Added repeating message
-Edited starter
-Fixed duping
-Added an economy reset (emergencies only)
-Fixed the leech prayers [Curse prayers]
-Added Draynor NPC thieving
-Fixed Falador
-Added donor ranks
-Mod information NPC
-Fixed mute command
-A fixed ::noclip command whether they add it to the client or not
-Edited the hit system
-Fixed duping methods
-Fixed the Jad minigame
-Highscores (shows only #1)

[hr]
Goals:
Red = Not Started Orange = working on Green = Completed

Jad minigame Basic NPC clipping Quest Tab voting method Firemaking Curse Prayers
Perfect magic Perfect melee Perfect Ranging Perfect PvE Perfect PvP
Perfect Fishing Perfect Woodcutting Sweets Skillcape Emotes Perfect Fight Pits
Zamorak Boss 474 anims load from the Cache Fullscreen 474 GFX load from cache Item degrading
Sea Troll Queen Giant Mole BarrelChest Vengence Pk Points
PkP Shop SoulSplit Mod Information NPC NPC Thieving No Dupes
Highscores
[hr]

So you can see that I’ve done quite a bit in just a few weeks.
I hope that I could add plenty more updates in the future.

Here’s Some Images:







































Read full topic
